result.execSummary:
The defendant Rashad L Lee was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: AS To Both Counts: Court ordered the defendant to submit a DNA sample and pay all associated costs. Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and fees by 5/5/16, or to be docketed as a civil judgment.
Consecutive to: To any other sentence, with credit for 83 days time served, STRAIGHT TIME.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rashad L Lee

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 
AS TO COUNT 1:
The Court ordered defendant to serve 90 days in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 83 days time served, STRAIGHT TIME. 

AS TO COUNT 2:
The Court ordered defendant to serve 90 days in the House of Correction, concurrent with count 1, with credit for 83 days time served, STRAIGHT TIME.


Court ordered the defendant to submit a DNA sample and pay all associated costs. Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and fees by 5/5/16, or to be docketed as a civil judgment.
Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
-Pretrial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Rashad L Lee in court with attorney Reyna Morales for Francisco Araiza.  Defendant Rashad L Lee in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for a status conference.
AS TO COUNTS 1 & 2:
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible. Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.

Attorney Reyna Morales for Francisco Araiza in court, defendant Rashad L Lee not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced, appearance wiaved.  Case scheduled for plea and sentencing, attorney Araiza is in trial on another matter.  Defense requests additional time to negotiate with the state.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Rashad L Lee in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Defendant Rashad L Lee in custody (bullpen).  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court in trial.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Rashad L Lee in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court will allow for a transfer of this case for a global resolution if Judge Kremers accept the transfer.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Francisco Araiza in court, defendant Rashad L Lee not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requested a projected guily plea date. Case adjourned to Branch 23. All parties are notified that effective September 14, 2015 this case will be assigned to Judge Michelle Ackerman Havas, Branch 45, in Room 515 of the Courthouse due to the rotation of Judge Grady in Branch 23.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with ANY CVS (INCLUDING 6330 N 76TH ST., MILWAUKEE; ALLEGED LOCATION OF OFFENSE) AND CO-DEF:  JOSHUA BROOKS.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers. No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Rashad L Lee in court with attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  Defendant Rashad L Lee in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bvj  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Current: 3152 W American Dr, Greenfield, WI 53221-2108   (Effective: 08-18-2015)
Prior: 4020 N 40TH ST, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($150.00 signature bond) gj
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 150.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Francisco Araiza in court. Morgan Wilz, appears as intern for the state under the student practice rule under the supervision of  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  The defendant having failed to appear, the court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with ANY CVS (INCLUDING 6330 N 76TH ST., MILWAUKEE; ALLEGED LOCATION OF OFFENSE) AND CO-DEF:  JOSHUA BROOKS.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

ADDRESS INFO for Rashad L Lee
Current: 4020 N 40TH ST, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 05-30-2015)
Prior: 3937 West Thurston Avenue, Milwaukee, WI 53209

Defendant Rashad L Lee in court with attorney Elizabeth A Carlson.  Defendant Rashad L Lee in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Parties are notified that effective June 8, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Reserved, Branch 45 in Courthouse room 515.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
